thread.title: NASCAR community reacts to Tony Stewart's retirement from Cup
thread.title_full: NASCAR community reacts to Tony Stewart's retirement from Cup

title: NASCAR community reacts to Tony Stewart's retirement from Cup
text:
Shake and Bake NASCAR Blog NASCAR community reacts to Tony Stewart's retirement from Cup Tony Stewart made it official. Many in the NASCAR community took to Twitter to react to the news. By Josh Richter - Shake and Bake Crew Sep 30, 2015 at 2:30p ET 0Shares 
Tony Stewart made it official. On Wednesday, "Smoke" announced that the 2016 season will be his last as a driver in the NASCAR Sprint Cup Series. 
Many in the NASCAR community took to Twitter and Instagram to react to the news. A photo posted by Kevin Harvick (@kevinharvick) on Sep 30, 2015 at 10:31am PDT Enjoyed all these years racing together with @TonyStewart . Hard to watch your peers hang it up. The track will miss a character like him. ‚Äî Dale Earnhardt Jr. (@DaleJr) September 30, 2015 We've had our moments, but its been awesome to race with and against you @TonyStewart pic.twitter.com/E1cn26Y6Wl ‚Äî Joey Logano (@joeylogano) September 30, 2015 Bittersweet listening to one of my biggest heroes make his announcement today. Just stoked to get to race against ya for a year, pal! #smoke ‚Äî Chase Elliott (@chaseelliott) September 30, 2015 @TonyStewart is one of the best drivers ever in all of motorsports. Can drive anything to its limits. ‚Äî Jeff Burton (@JeffBurton) September 30, 2015 @TonyStewart was always one of my heroes growing up racing.. He is now my boss, my owner.. I couldn't ask for a better one.. üëäüèº ‚Äî Rodney Childers (@RodneyChilders4) September 30, 2015 Wishing @TonyStewart the best! Looking forward to a great final season in 2016. #NASCAR pic.twitter.com/SQ9yB52k0I ‚Äî Mobil 1 (@Mobil1) September 30, 2015 Makes me Happy to hear @TonyStewart SO HAPPY about retiring from driving a @NASCAR "CUP" Car after 2016üèÅ
